title: TNSED Schools
description: The app will be used by the teachers, Heads of schools, and other administrative staff to enter student, staff and school data and track the same. The app currently has modules for entering students and staff attendance, modules for screening the health of the students and referring them to the doctors, module for identifying and tracking the out of school students and module for teachers to register for teacher training.
descriptionHTML: The app will be used by the teachers, Heads of schools, and other administrative staff to enter student, staff and school data and track the same. The app currently has modules for entering students and staff attendance, modules for screening the health of the students and referring them to the doctors, module for identifying and tracking the out of school students and module for teachers to register for teacher training.
summary: Official app for the teachers by State School Education Department, Tamil Nadu
comments: Applying a leave in this app is hard. Couln't upload supporting document with leave. It is not showing option to upload. I have downloaded different devices and seen but also the problem exists. Worst experience. Make it flexible for all devices.
Once I submitted all the formative assessment details it's recorded and then when I logout all the details are gone and it's still same not recorded, please rectify this bug asap

Server problem app is crashing.sometimes we are not able to log in.Assessment entered for the student is not displaying,so we again entering the same datas for the same student.IF One teacher has completed assessment means , in my login the same assesssment will shown as not completed.In library we can't add the books weeklywise. Now the option replace is available.If we get a chance to replace the books weekly upto december ,it should be useful to the children.
daily updating, not opening properly, always rounding, only worst
While using this app my phone is hanging. So-scholasti while using this app my phone is hanging so many times.even we fishing our work while we check if it is completed in shows unfinished .
